actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to convey certain property at Downey, Illinois to the University of Health and Sciences/The Chicago Medical School, a private, nonprofit institution.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to convey certain property at Downey, Illinois to the University of Health and Sciences, the Chicago Medical School.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to convey certain property at Downey, Illinois to the University of Health and Sciences/The Chicago Medical School, a private, nonprofit institution.
